Package de.akquinet.jbosscc.guttenbase.hints

Interface Summary
ConnectorHint<T> Users may add configuration "hints" that influence the tools.
 

Class Summary
ColumnDataMapperProviderHint Used to find mappings for column data.
ColumnMapperHint Select target column(s) for given source column.
ColumnNameMapperHint Map the way column names of a table are used.
ColumnOrderHint Determine order of columns in SELECT statement.
ColumnTypeResolverListHint Determine strategies to use for mapping different column types.
DatabaseTableFilterHint Regard which tables when DatabaseMetaDataInspectorTool is looking for tables in the given data base.
EntityTableCheckerHint Check if the given table is a "main" table in the sense that it represents an entity.
ExportDumpExtraInformationHint When exporting to e JAR/ZIP file we give the user a possibility to add extra informations to the dumped data.
ExporterFactoryHint Create @see Exporter for dumping database using @see ExportDumpConnector.
ImportDumpExtraInformationHint When exporting to JAR/ZIP file we give the user a possibility to retrieve extra informations from the dumped data.
ImporterFactoryHint Create @see Importer for reading dumped database using @see ImportDumpConnector.
MaxNumberOfDataItemsHint How many data items may an INSERT statement have.
NumberOfCheckedTableDataHint How many rows of the copied tables shall be regarded when checking that data has been transferred correctly with the CheckEqualTableDataTool tool.
NumberOfRowsPerInsertionHint How many rows will be inserted in single transaction? This is an important performance issue.
RepositoryColumnFilterHint This filter is applied when @see ConnectorRepository.getDatabaseMetaData(String) is called.
RepositoryTableFilterHint This filter is applied when @see ConnectorRepository.getDatabaseMetaData(String) is called.
SplitColumnHint Sometimes the amount of data exceeds buffers.
TableMapperHint Map tables between source and target
TableNameMapperHint Map table names, e.g.
TableOrderHint Determine order of tables during copying/comparison.
ZipExporterClassResourcesHint When exporting to e JAR/ZIP file we allow to add custom classes and resources to the resulting JAR.
